statements: SELECT * FROM tourist_feedback WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT destination_name, rating FROM tourist_feedback WHERE sustainability_rating < 3.0;
SELECT feedback_id, destination_name, feedback_text FROM tourist_feedback WHERE date_submitted > '2022-01-01';
SELECT destination_name, rating, sustainability_rating FROM tourist_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT destination_name, feedback_text, date_submitted FROM tourist_feedback ORDER BY date_submitted ASC;
SELECT * FROM tourist_feedback WHERE destination_name = 'Paris' ORDER BY date_submitted DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, destination_name, rating FROM tourist_feedback WHERE sustainability_rating > 3;
SELECT destination_name, COUNT(*) AS feedback_count FROM tourist_feedback GROUP BY destination_name HAVING feedback_count > 5;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM tourist_feedback WHERE rating BETWEEN 4.5 AND 5;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS avg_rating, MAX(rating) AS max_rating, MIN(rating) AS min_rating FROM tourist_feedback;
SELECT * FROM tourist_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM tourist_feedback WHERE destination_id = 5;
SELECT destination_name, sustainable_rating FROM sustainability_practices WHERE sustainable_rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_practices WHERE travelers_impact < 50 ORDER BY destination_name ASC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating, submission_date FROM tourist_feedback WHERE rating < 3;
SELECT * FROM tourist_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM tourist_feedback WHERE destination_id = 1;
SELECT destination_name, sustainable_rating FROM sustainability_practices WHERE travelers_impact > 50 ORDER BY sustainable_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM tourist_feedback WHERE submission_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT destination_name, travelers_impact, community_engagement FROM sustainability_practices WHERE sustainable_rating >= 4 ORDER BY travelers_impact DESC
SELECT * FROM tourist_reviews WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT tourist_name, destination_name, rating FROM tourist_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT destination_name, sustainability_rating FROM destinations WHERE sustainability_rating > 3;
SELECT analysis_id, destination_id, sustainability_rating, average_rating FROM feedback_analysis;
SELECT tourist_name, destination_name, feedback FROM tourist_reviews WHERE destination_name = 'Paris';
SELECT tourist_name, destination_name, rating FROM tourist_reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY tourist_name ASC, rating DESC
SELECT * FROM destinations WHERE sustainability_rating >= 3 ORDER BY destination_name DESC
SELECT feedback, rating FROM tourist_reviews WHERE destination_name = 'Paris' OR destination_name = 'Dubai'
SELECT destination_id, sustainability_rating, average_rating FROM feedback_analysis ORDER BY sustainability_rating DESC, average_rating ASC
SELECT review_id, tourist_name, destination_name, rating FROM tourist_reviews WHERE tourist_name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT tourist_name, nationality FROM tourist WHERE age < 30;
SELECT review_text FROM reviews WHERE feedback_id = 3;
SELECT destination_name, location FROM destination WHERE sustainability_rating >= 8;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE tourist_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY rating DESC, feedback_id ASC;
SELECT tourist_id, tourist_name, nationality FROM tourist WHERE age > 30;
SELECT destination_name, location, sustainability_rating FROM destination WHERE sustainability_rating > 3;
SELECT r.reviewer_name, f.rating, f.feedback_text FROM reviews r INNER JOIN feedback f ON r.feedback_id = f.feedback_id;
SELECT f.feedback_text, t.tourist_name, d.destination_name FROM feedback f LEFT JOIN tourist t ON f.tourist_id = t.tourist_id LEFT JOIN destination d ON f.destination_id = d.destination_id;
SELECT * FROM destinations;
SELECT destination_name, sustainability_rating FROM destinations;
SELECT destination_id, destination_name FROM destinations ORDER BY destination_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT review_text, review_date FROM reviews WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM destinations;
SELECT destination_name, sustainability_rating FROM destinations WHERE sustainability_rating > 4;

SELECT u.username, d.destination_name, r.review_text FROM users u JOIN feedback f ON u.user_id = f.user_id JOIN reviews r ON f.feedback_id = r.feedback_id JOIN destinations d ON d.destination_id = f.destination_id;

SELECT d.destination_name, f.feedback_text, r.review_date FROM destinations d JOIN feedback f ON d.destination_id = f.destination_id JOIN reviews r ON f.feedback_id = r.feedback_id WHERE r.review_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT s.metric_name, s.metric_description FROM sustainability_metrics s LEFT JOIN destinations d ON s.sustainability_metric_id = d.sustainability_rating;
